oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt 02 from consolidation interview with Ferris Deep, December 16, 1994
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Ferris Deep, conducted on December 16, 1994 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Deep discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
